missDescriptions.missText: Gripping the blade with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the teeth pierce [npc2.herHim] with senseless wrath. [npc2.Name] [npc.verb(dodge)] the blade but barely.
Gripping the axe tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with fierce speed. Giving [npc2.herHim] a chance to avoid the menacing Great Daemon Axe.
